    "name": "Initial prime of a prime chain of length n under the iteration x->5x+2.",
    "comment": [
        "This is a special case of prime chains generated by f(x) = cx + d.",
        "a(11) > 8695354111. - _Donovan Johnson_, Sep 27 2008"
    ],
    "reference": [
        "D. H. Lehmer, On certain chains of primes, Proc. London Math. Soc. (3) 14a 1965 183-186."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(3)=13 since 13, f(13)=67 and f(67)=337 are primes when f(x) = 5x+2."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "c[p_] := Block[{k = 1, q = 5*p+2}, While[ PrimeQ[q], q = 5*q+2; k++]; k]; a[n_] := Block[{p = 2}, While[c[p] < n, p = NextPrime@ p]; p]; Array[a, 7] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 21 2017 *)"
    ],

        "Cf. A057330, A057331, A083388, A084954, A084955, A084956, A084957, A084959, A084960, A084961."
